briefTitle: Investigation of Stem Cells in Human Lipoaspirate
officialTitle: Investigation of Adipose-Derived Stem Cells in Human Lipoaspirate
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All adults (18-70 yrs) who have scheduled surgical lipectomy of the hips, abdomen, or thighs are prospective subjects for this study.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant women will be excluded to protect the unborn child.
